GSD.description:
power: supply: adp5061: fix out-of-bounds read in adp5061_get_chg_type()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 89f305a71418591cdda18180f712f91c9820f03b. For more details please see the references link.
